info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued March 23 at 2:27PM EDT until March 23 at 9:00PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 245 PM EDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN ALLEN AND NORTHWESTERN ADAMS COUNTIES... At 226 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles northeast of Ossian to near Decatur, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Decatur, Middletown, Preble, Magley, Hoagland, Peterson, Monmouth, Maples and Poe. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
